summary: I love Meinfoos and Meinshaos! I always wanted to raise one but haven't managed to catch one yet. Do you perhaps have anything...
question: I love Meinfoos and Meinshaos! I always wanted to raise one but haven't managed to catch one yet. Do you perhaps have anything one should know before getting one or just simple facts about them?
answer:
The first thing you should know about mienfoo and mienshao is that the speed they are known for in martial arts extends to the rest of their behavior. They can be dizzyingly fast and agile, which is an asset in battle but can make them a nightmare to take care of, especially when they are first captured or adopted and are still testing their trainers to see how much they can get away with. Their Poké Balls will be invaluable.

They are carnivorous, and sometimes hunt rattata and other small rodent pokémon. For this reason, they should be kept away from their usual prey until they are well-trained enough to be safe. The best diet for a mienfoo or mienshao is mostly farm raised meat– look for ethically sourced miltank– with a supplement of berries. Keep them away from fiber, as they cannot process this and it often leads to constipation.

Mienfoo and mienshao need to train their martial arts regularly; if not allowed the proper time and equipment, they are likely to break objects in their trainers’ houses trying to train. They do not need much complicated equipment, but a punching bag is recommended. Make sure you give them enough time every day to run through their katas. If you are willing, they might also try to train you and spar with you.

you can ask more you know
summary: Angsty ask meme: 15, 25, 35, 45, 50 (for you know who :p)
question: Angsty ask meme: 15, 25, 35, 45, 50 (for you know who :p)
answer:
More Giovanni/Nanu for you ! ♥ (and me. And all the lovers of this ship… say hi if you like the ship, we feel alone 8D)

• who misses the other more, or really thinks about them more?

I would say Nanu. Because chasing Giovanni was part of his job and now he is retired, he feels a bit empty. Giovanni has still the Team Rocket around him, evil schemes to plan, and a son to distantly watch over. And Nanu, despite his Kahuna’s duties and the sweet little girl who calls him « Uncle », hadn’t really any spice in his life now. Fortunately for him, Giovanni interest in Ultra-Wormholes and Ultra-Beast led him on Nanu’s home island…


• what’s the one deal breaker for either of them (lack of communication, fear of commitment, etc)?

It would be for both to tell the world the real nature of their relationship.


• do they have any regrets (regarding the other, or just in general)?

I think they regret to not be able to go over their labels : one is an Interpol Officer, the other is a Mob Boss. Deep inside them, they are a bid saddened to have only to play cops and robbers to excuse their relationship.


• who would be more likely to save who? 

Both. But I think anyway Nanu would be more likely to save Giovanni than the opposite, because even if both need each other to feel alive, Nanu hasn’t anymore to argue, fight, foil and escapre traps, hate and have confuse shameful feelings, if Giovanni is no more. Giovanni has the Team Rocket to lead to escape sadness and grief if he can’t save Nanu.


• if one of them were to come back after a long time, who would come to who? would it go well? would the other person take them back?

It depends of wich one landed the last blow. Even if the other take a really long time to come back, the other would know he would come anyway, unexpectedly, with a nice and elaborate plan and new ideas of fine torture after releasing him and flee. And the receiver would take a painful pleasure of all these attentions, and then think of new means to trap the other and get a delicious revenge. They are too attracted each other, they need so badly their little games so, even if it takes a long time, one would always come back to the other and they would resume their play.

blog.name: strawbebehmod
blog.title: The Fullfelt Alchemist
blog.description: She/her Birthday: May 19th Bio major Catholic Residence: United States of America Mod blog for a few side blogs and such. For reblogs, art, fanfiction, and a crap ton of aus. Feel free to send me asks, messages, or whatever. Currently obsessing over: Fma, blue exorcist, my hero academia, extinct and endangered animals (tag for that is extinct species if you want to avoid it) I try to keep this blog ship hate free, but occasionally use the tag 'fandom discourse' for critique on shipping/fandom drama. feel free to send me asks about anything!

summary: Pokemon Centre Debuts Lavender Town-Inspired Back To School Apparel And Accessories
title: Pokemon Centre Debuts Lavender Town-Inspired Back To School Apparel And Accessories
body:
Pokemon Centre Debuts Lavender Town-Inspired Back To School Apparel And Accessories

The latest collection of merchandise from the Pokémon Center is hauntingly fashionable for fans of one of the most mysterious locations in the Pokémon world. The Pokémon Company International today unveiled a new original line of apparel and accessories influenced by Lavender Town, an iconic and fan-favorite location in the Kanto region. This new collection is now available exclusively in the US…

View On WordPress

blog.name: pokegodsandmissingno
blog.title: P̵o̵K̸é̴G̸o̸D̷s̸ and Frightful Things to Come?
blog.description: There is a growing desire and expectation of humans here on Earth in making full contact with PoKéMoN who are still unknown. Back in 1995, when I saw my first UPM (Unindexed Pocket Monster), I found out very quickly that other people thought you were totally crazy if you said you saw such things. The world has changed quite a bit since then when I was a child. In fact, in late 1997, a poll taken in Kanto shows that for the first time ever, more than fifty percent of residents now believe in PokéGODS's. Since then, there have been polls that put the figure at over eighty percent or more.
